root.name: Blood: The Last Vampire - First Volume
root.description: OverviewBlood: The Last Vampire - First Volume is the first of a two part game tie-in to Hiroyuki Kitakubo's anime film of the same name. The game was the last game developed by Sugar Rockets and was the sixth and final entry in the Yarudora series of FMV visual novels. The First Volume was released in Japan for the PS2 on December 21, 2000 and in 2005 the game was re-released as Yarudora Portable: Blood The Last Vampire for the PSP, which also included the Last Volume.TriviaThe Blood: The Last Vampire game was the first project famed animator Shinya Ohira worked on when he returned to anime after his absence from the industry for many years.
